questions.question: I'VE BEEN STARING AT THESE DOUBLE D'S...THE BATTERIES IN THIS TOMORROWLAND ATTRACTION.

questions.answer: What is Journey Into Imagination with Figment?

questions.question: I'VE BEEN STARING AT THE GIANT MURAL BY MARY BLAIR IN THIS RESORT.
I'VE BEEN STARING AT THE MIDDLE OF THE GIANT WHEEL AT MISSION: SPACE AND SEE THE LOGO FOR THIS FORMER ATTRACTION.
THIS RESTAURANT OFFERS A FANTASMIC DINING PACKAGE WHILE OFFERING SOMETHING ON THE BORDER OF BEING CALLED ITALIAN FOOD
AT THE EDGE OF ANIMAL KINGDOM IS THIS AREA ONLY ACCESSIBLE BY THE WILDLIFE EXPRESS TRAIN.
THIS MAGIC KINGDOM ATTRACTION ENCIRCLES THE EDGE OF THE PARK.
questions.answer: What is the Walt Disney World Railroad?

questions.question: THIS DISASTER AREA FORMERLY WREAKED HAVOC AT THE EDGE OF HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS.
THIS IS THE NAME OF THE PARK ENTRANCE AT THE BACK EDGE OF EPCOT.
ALL OF THE INTERNATIONAL PAVILIONS IN EPCOT ARE AROUND THIS BODY OF WATER.
questions.answer: What is the World Showcase Lagoon?

questions.question: SCREENS OF WATER SHOW THE STORY OF MICKEY'S IMAGINATION AT THIS NIGHTTIME SPECTACTULAR.
THE BLUE BAYOU AT DISNEYLAND IS WHERE YOU CAN SEE THE BOATS FOR THIS ATTRACTION.
questions.answer: What is Pirates of the Caribbean?

questions.question: IN HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS, THIS DINOSAUR CAN BE FOUND IN THE WATER SERVING ICE CREAM.
THIS RESTAURANT OVERLOOKS THE RIVER WHERE THE GRAN FIESTA TOUR BOATS PASS THROUGH.
questions.answer: What is the San Angel Inn?

questions.question: THIS OPENING DAY ALICE IN WONDERLAND FANTASYLAND ATTRACTION IS STILL SPINNING TODAY.
NO LONGER UNDER NEW MANAGEMENT, THIS ATTRACTION WAS AROUND ON OPENING DAY.
questions.answer: What is Walt Disney's Enchanted Tiki Room (Tropical Serenade)?

questions.question: THE SONG FROM THIS WORLD'S FAIR ATTRACTION, NOW IN FANTASYLAND, IS STILL STUCK IN MY HEAD.
questions.answer: What is it's a small world?

questions.question: THE LONG LINES ARE STILL AROUND AT THIS OPENING DAY ATTRACTION IN FANTASYLAND, BUT NOW THEY HAVE AN INTERACTIVE QUEUE.
BESIDES THE COUNTRY BEAR JAMBOREE, THIS IS THE ONLY OTHER OPENING DAY ATTRACTION AT FRONTIERLAND STILL AROUND TODAY.
ENTER EPCOT AND HEAD STRAIGHT INTO THIS GEODESIC SPHERE.
TAKE THE MONORAIL FROM THE TRANSPORTATION AND TICKET CENTER ON THE RESORT LOOP AND GET OFF AT THE FIRST STOP.
BEAR LEFT AT THE TREE OF LIFE, CROSS THE BRIDGE, BEAR LEFT, AND ENTER THE HARAMBE THEATER.
questions.answer: What is Festival of the Lion King?

questions.question: HEAD TO THE CHINESE THEATER, TURN LEFT, AND ENTER THE HYPERION THEATER.
HEAD RIGHT AT THE HUB AND BOARD THE ELEVATORS TO THIS ATTRACTION ABOVE THE PEOPLEMOVER.
I BROKE THAT THIS RESORT WILL UNDERGO MAJOR RENOVATIONS INCLUDING A CONVENTION CENTER EXPANSION. YOU'RE WELCOME.
ON FEBRUARY 10, I BROKE THAT THIS NEW NIGHTTIME SHOW WOULD FINALLY SOFT OPEN LATER THAT WEEK. YOU'RE WELCOME.
I GAVE YOU A BLURRY IMAGE OF A FLYING BANSHEE FROM THIS UPCOMING ANIMAL KINGDOM ATTRACTION. YOU'RE WELCOME.
ON FEBRUARY 3, I BROKE THAT THIS HOLLYWOOD STUDIOS QUICK SERVICE VENUE WOULD CLOSE THE NEXT DAY. YOU'RE WELCOME.
questions.answer: What is Starring Roles Cafe and Bakery?

questions.question: ON FEBRUARY 22, I BROKE THAT THIS SERVICE INCREASED TO $19 FOR THE DAY AND $29 FOR A WEEK. YOU'RE WELCOME.
questions.answer: What is the Express Bus Service?

questions.question: IT MAY NOT LOOK LIKE IT FROM THE FRONT, BUT THIS IS THE LARGEST ATTRACTION IN LIBERTY SQUARE.
THE RIVERS OF AMERICA IS WHERE YOU CAN FIND THIS LIBERTY SQUARE ATTRACTION.
questions.answer: What is the Liberty Square Riverboat?

questions.question: THIS FAMILY STYLE RESTAURANT IN LIBERY SQUARE HAS SIX ROOMS, EACH COMMEMORATING A PIVOTAL FIGURE IN U.S. HISTORY.
questions.answer: What is the Liberty Tree Tavern?

questions.question: A REPLICA OF THIS NATIONAL MONUMENT WAS CREATED FROM A MOLD AND PLACED IN LIBERTY SQUARE.
PICK UP A HOLIDAY ORNAMENT FOR YOUR TREE AT THIS LIBERTY SQUARE STORE.
questions.answer: What is Ye Olde Christmas Shoppe?

questions.question: OH, BRIGHT LITTLE STAR, THIS IS WHERE YOU CAN LISTEN TO SONNY ECLIPSE.
questions.answer: What is Cosmic Ray's Starlight Cafe?

questions.question: FIND THE INSPIRATION FOR OUR "FIGARO IS A CAT" SHIRT AT THIS COUNTER SERVICE RESTAURANT.
GRAB SOME KATSU CURRY AT THIS COUNTER SERVICE LOCATION IN JAPAN AT EPCOT.
PROPS FROM "THE GOLDBERGS" ARE SCATTERED AROUND THIS COUNTER SERVICE EATERY.
HAVE SOME FRENCH FRIES AND PULLED PORK AT THIS ANIMAL KINGDOM COUNTER SERVICE LOCATION, WITH SOME DISTINCT SAUCE WHILE IT LASTS.
THIS TCM HOST WHO JUST PASSED AWAY NARRATES THE RIDE AND PRESHOW MOVIE.
THESE TWO CHARACTERS TAKE OVER YOUR VEHICLE DEPENDING ON WHERE YOU BOARD.
questions.answer: What are the gangster and the cowboy?

questions.question: THESE TWO STAR WARS CHARACTERS CAN BE FOUND OF THE WALLS OF THE INDIANA JONES SCENE.
ORIGINALLY TURNING AND SHOOTING WATER, THIS MOVIE'S DISPLAY IS IN A CONSTANT B-MODE.
THE WICKED WITCH OF THE WEST WAS THE FIRST OF THIS MODEL OF AUDIO ANIMATRONICS.
THE FIRST MONORAIL WRAP WAS FOR THIS FEATURE FILM IN 2010 AND WAS NICKNAMED BY ADDING THE FIRST TWO LETTERS OF THE FILM.
THE CURRENT BIGGEST PROJECT FOR THE MONORAIL IS ADDING THIS FUNCTIONALITY.
JUST LIKE THIS GAME, THE MONORAIL IS ADDING THIS ACTIVITY.
THE MOST RECENT ADDITION TO THE MARK VI MONORAIL FLEET IS THIS COLOR.
THIS IS HOW MANY MONORAILS HAVE A DELTA ON THEIR COLORS.
IF YOU LOOK IN THE WINDOW OF THIS MAGIC KINGDOM RESTAURANT, YOU CAN SEE LADY AND THE TRAMP.
questions.answer: What is Tony's Town Square Restaurant?

questions.question: HAVE SOME PIZZA AT THIS EPCOT ITALIAN EATERY.
THIS DISNEY SPRINGS ITALIAN RESTAURANT IS NAMED FOR A TYPE OF MUSHROOM.
ON DISNEY'S BOARDWALK, THIS ITALIAN RESTAURANT SERVES BREAKFAST AND DINNER.
THIS OPENING DAY EPCOT RESTAURANT WAS REPLACED BY TUTTO ITALIA IN 2007
questions.answer: What is L'Originale Alfredo di Roma Ristorante?

questions.answer: What is Finding Nemo: The Musical?

questions.question: LET'S HAVE FOZZIE TELL JOKES WITH MIKE WAZOWSKI AT THIS ATTRACTION! LET'S SEE WHOSE JOKES ARE WORSE!
questions.answer: What is Monsters Inc Laugh Floor?

questions.question: LET'S HAVE KERMIT DRESS AS THIS ACTION HERO LIKE HE DID IN MUPPET BABIES AND "THE MUPPETS AT WALT DISNEY WORLD"!
